DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , open-label , cross-over study evaluate effect carbamazepine pharmacokinetics RO4917523 healthy volunteer . Healthy volunteer receive single dose RO4917523 alone combination multiple dos carbamazepine cross-over design . The anticipated time study treatment 40 day .

DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , 1865 year age inclusive Nonsmokers Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 mg/m2 inclusive Women menopausal surgically sterile agree use two adequate method contraception Evidence active chronic disease History significant disease ( e.g. , cardiovascular , hepatic , renal ) cancer History presence clinically significant psychiatric condition Any condition disease would render volunteer unsuitable study , place volunteer undue risk interfere ability volunteer complete study
